sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended size: 850 x 650

sub_fields.label: Video Link
sub_fields.name: video_link
sub_fields.instructions: For youtube and vimeo please use the embed link. Normal URL links won't work on iframes. For uploaded videos in the site please use the absolute url.

sub_fields.label: Data
sub_fields.name: data
sub_fields.instructions: Auto - automatically pulls data from selected products. Manual - Input data one by one.

sub_fields.label: Enable Featured Block
sub_fields.name: enable_featured_block
sub_fields.instructions: Convert first item to a full width featured product item

sub_fields.label: Featured Products Auto
sub_fields.name: featured_products_auto
sub_fields.instructions: First selected item will be treated as the main featured product displaying full width. The rest will be in a 3x3 grid

sub_fields.label: Grid Featured Products Manual
sub_fields.name: grid_featured_products_manual
sub_fields.instructions: 3x3 featured products grid

sub_fields.label: Button Layout
sub_fields.name: button_layout
sub_fields.instructions: "Default" will show the type.category and will only have 1 cta button while "2 CTA Button" removes the category text and add a generic get a quote cta button next to the first one.

sub_fields.label: Get a quote text
sub_fields.name: get_a_quote_text
sub_fields.instructions: Use this field If you wish to have a different text for the "Get a quote" button.

sub_fields.label: Browse All Button
sub_fields.name: browse_all_button
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to hide in frontend

sub_fields.label: Project Image
sub_fields.name: project_image
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended size: 824 x 496

sub_fields.label: Note
sub_fields.message:
Go to Theme Setting -> Our Clients Tab to edit client logos.

Adding more than 7 logos will convert this section from just a static list of images into a auto rotating image carousel.

sub_fields.label: How to use
sub_fields.message:
This floating bar lets you jump to specific sections/components within a page.

All you need to do is go to the section component of your choice -> Go to advanced tab -> Add a custom ID as an identifier -> and use that identifier in the "Section Component Target ID" field in the repeater below.

Identifier should be lowercase. No white spaces or replace it with a dash.

Recommended max number of quicklinks: 5
